Why Choose HMCâ€™s Orthopedic Services?

Orthopedics is a medical specialty concerned with diseases, injuries, and other conditions of the human musculoskeletal system. Orthopedic conditions range from hereditary problems, such as scoliosis, to something acquired, such as repetitive stress on joints. HMC offers a variety of individual orthopedic services including arthritis care, back and neck pain programs, hip and knee replacements, and hip resurfacing. HMC uses a multidisciplinary approach to total joint replacement surgery and offers minimally invasive knee and hip replacement techniques that decrease pain, recovery time, and scarring.

HMC Imaging Services

The orthopedic services at HMC are supported by our in-house Diagnostic Radiology Department, which has a long history of providing a full range of imaging services, from traditional X-rays to state-of-the-art scanning procedures. Learn more about Imaging Services at HMC .

Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine at HMC

Orthopedic services at HMC are further supported by our exceptional rehabilitation services, which have long been a source of pride for HMC. The services offered by the Hopedale Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine departments range from Orthopedic to the treatment of wounds and helping athletes maximize their on-field performance.
